name: Spyware
description:
"Spyware" is about a software that takes things from the trashbin of people and delivers it to a user that wants to have such data.

Collect and deliver 5 such datafiles to win the game!
Each run has a randomized pattern where you collect the data and where you ahve to deliver it.

A+D  = move left and right
Space = Push yourself up
F = Mute or play Soundtrack

Thanks to Kevin Macleod for the music! :3
